content:
The decision of the Uzhgorod interdistrict court in custody for 60 days sent a man who helped the evasion of illegally cross the border.

About thisShe reported March 23State Border Service of Ukraine.

Now the man will be in custody unless he pays the pledge of UAH 242 thousand.

According to the department, the man repeatedly got into the field of view of the border guards, and on March 16 this year, law enforcement officers detained him "on hot". He tried to transfer two violators from Slovakia to Slovakia.

AsThe ArmyInform reported earlier, in Bukovina, three evicters were detained 50 meters from the border.
title: In Transcarpathia, the hazard carrier was assigned a pledge in a quarter of a million
description: This was reported on March 23 by the State Border Service of Ukraine. Now a man ...
author: Army Inform
